Title: The 300 Spartans
Writer: George St. George, Ugo Liberatore (original story material), Remigio Del Grosso (original story material), Giovanni d'Eramo (original story material), Gian Paolo Callegari (original story material)
Actors: Richard Egan, Ralph Richardson, Diane Baker, Barry Coe
Plot: A small Army of Greeks spearheaded by three hundred Spartans do battle with the whole invading Persian Army.
